author: chetanm
msg: OAK-2570 - Open indexes in IndexTracker non blocking way
Removed the 2 TODO. No code change done
- Use DirectoryReader.openIfChanged() - Not required as Index is only opened if there is a change in index data
- Concern around closing index taking time - Given that IndexTracker is now invoked from a BackgroundObserver this should not be a cause of concern now
